name: Cybersecurity PhD
description: I worked on symbolic deobfuscation and its application to malware analysis. The PhD took place in a french research lab at CEA focusing on formal methods. I developped obfuscations method robust against symbolic analysis using C, Ocaml and python.

name: Freelance graphic design
description: I do freelance design work for Twitch streamers. I create streaming assets including illustrations, motions design alerts and animated screens

name: Cybersecurity internship
description: I joind a pentesting team for 6 month. I helped on web pentesting missions and did research work about the communication protocol NFC.

name: Vinci Energy internship
description: Development of a php-based web application for the team
